System.Name: Skeleton system
System.Function: Form a protective model to protect the muscles.

System.Name: Digestive system
System.Function: Breaks down the chemical components of food.
System.Parts: 1. Mouth 2. Throat 3. Stomach 4. Intestines 5. Rectum 6. Anus

System.Name: Nervous system
System.Function: Gathers information and controlls the overall human system.
